channel.title: Where do i add my commands?
channel.description: I know that you add to client.java but idk where inside it. I cant find any other commands either. PLEASE HELP :O

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:16, topic:404931”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=501944.msg3672613#msg3672613 date=1311034726]
MoparScape.org > Runescape 2 Client Development > Client Help > Where do i add my commands?

Assuming what you’re asking is related to the actual section: client class - I believe a command already in almost all (if not all) revisions is “fpson”.
[/quote]
You’re in idiot. This belongs in server help because commands (with a few exceptions) are server sided[/quote]
That’s why he highlighted Client Help. You just read his post wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i add my commands?

item.title: Where do i add my commands?

item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:6, topic:404931”]MoparScape.org > Runescape 2 Client Development > Client Help > Where do i add my commands?

Assuming what you’re asking is related to the actual section: client class - I believe a command already in almost all (if not all) revisions is “fpson”.[/quote]
You’re in idiot. This belongs in server help because commands (with a few exceptions) are server sided

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i add my commands?

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:405056”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=501944.msg3673118#msg3673118 date=1311067111]

MoparScape.org > Runescape 2 Client Development > Client Help > Where do i add my commands?

Assuming what you’re asking is related to the actual section: client class - I believe a command already in almost all (if not all) revisions is “fpson”.

Last I checked I add most of my main commands server sided. Actually, I hardly ever add one through my client?

As it should be. Most commands should be server-side. The exception to this rule is things that can only be handled via the client (ie. the FPS, memory usage, etc).
[/quote]WAT BOUT INTERFACES

CAN I

if (inputString.equals("interface")) { try { String[] args = inputString.split(" "); int id1 = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int id2 = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); fullscreenInterfaceID = id1; openInterfaceID = id2; pushMessage("Opened Interface", 0, ""); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }PLEASE[/quote]

H4X!

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i add my commands?

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:13, topic:404931”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=501944.msg3672613#msg3672613 date=1311034726]
MoparScape.org > Runescape 2 Client Development > Client Help > Where do i add my commands?

Assuming what you’re asking is related to the actual section: client class - I believe a command already in almost all (if not all) revisions is “fpson”.
[/quote]

Last I checked I add most of my main commands server sided. Actually, I hardly ever add one through my client?[/quote]

As it should be. Most commands should be server-side. The exception to this rule is things that can only be handled via the client (ie. the FPS, memory usage, etc).

Read full topic

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

That’s not a command. Search for

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) {

Or something like that. Search parts in case yours is different.

Read full topic

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @pured_of_uth pured of uth
item.description:
@pured_of_uth wrote:

alright so for like example
i see this
public void welcome() {
}

when i type under it it gives me some errors like illegal start of type and expected. Can you please help again? im trying to add a spec command and its just giving me errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do i add my commands?

item.title: Where do i add my commands?
item.dc:creator: @_onster мonster
item.description:
@_onster wrote:

[quote=“pured of uth, post:5, topic:404931”][quote author=мonster link=topic=501944.msg3672069#msg3672069 date=1311002706]
PI has a class file in model/players/packetManager/packets, called Commands.java. I can’t remember the exact directory with out referring to it first.
[/quote]
i dont have that folder does it mean that i have delta or something else?[/quote]
If you just have one folder with all the class files in it, it’ll be in Client.java. Search “command” until you find the void/a command.

Read full topic
